    Return 0 if all digits are even.
    For example:
    digits(1)  == 1
    digits(4)  == 0
    digits(235) == 15
    """
    if n % 2 == 0:
        return 0
    if n % 4 == 0:
        return 1
    if n % 8 == 0:
        return 2
    if n % 16 == 0:
        return 3
    return 0
